content.question: The writer wants to add information to the beginning of sentence 6, adjusting the capitalization as needed, to help establish the credibility of the source of the information in the sentence. Which of the following choices most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: According to Paul Harrington, a Drexel University professor of labor markets,
According to a Drexel University professor,
According to a university professor who is an expert on labor markets,

content.answer: According to Paul Harrington, a Drexel University professor of labor markets,

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
